name: Total Species
overview: This game is the sequel to Emotional Conflict. In that game you tried to hunt down Mutant Mickey, a head-case, but upon finding him, you let him slip through your slimy, greasy, oily fingers. Though you did manage to recover the rare, lost coin. And now we're back, back FOR REVENGE, I tell you. This time, MM has kidnapped your Mother and is holding her hostage in this maximum security hotel, where rich celebrities like Mikey stay. You begin in the lobby and begin your revenge from there! Game came packed with a sub game called Wormzies. Asa Margetts was the creator and developer of this overhead, point and click PD game.
